com.capitalone.dashboard.collector

Class DefaultSubversionClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.capitalone.dashboard.collector.DefaultSubversionClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SubversionClient

    @Component
public class DefaultSubversionClient
extends Object
implements SubversionClient
    SubversionClient implementation that uses SVNKit to fetch information about Subversion repositories.
